developerResponse: {'id': 27712236, 'body': 'Hey Carterdeville,\n\r\nThanks for taking the time to share your experience. We loved to hear that our contents are much easier to learn and understand Python.', 'modified': '2022-01-28T04:49:14Z'}
content:
I like to tinker and make things. I wanted to automate some projects but wondered if I could learn to program. This course breaks down coding into easy to understand, basic parts, allowing me to tinker with each concept so the light comes on for me. 
I am several lessons into the course now, but have confidence I will be programming soon based on the approach this app takes to teaching coding.
title: As a Maker, I wanted to learn python

content: It’s a great way to learn Python if you don’t have access to a computer! I’m trying to build a habit of opening this app whenever I want to kill time with my phone. No more wasting time with useless games and social media.
title: Learning Python

content: No ads. Useful coding examples, along with practice coding exercises to work on your own. Great quizzes with detailed explanations of each answer. Intelligently written lessons that clearly explains Python & they are straight to the point. For example: they discuss sequences before discussing for loops. I love this app!!!
